functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Guarded Rapier\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"A precise thrusting sword that can","color":"gray"}','{"text":"chain many hits on opponents to","color":"gray"}','{"text":"great effect.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 12","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Cost: 5","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Regeneration Delay: 1.1s","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+1.8 Stamina Regeneration","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+5 Armour Toughness","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+4 Armour","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Weight: 2.0","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:11,Operation:0,UUID:[I;-2108553264,-1517218045,1210944401,1020867620],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1020,UUID:[I;-921872288,493779686,1627476148,1456172614],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"generic.armor",Operation:0,Amount:4,UUID:[I;768656696,-1595334614,-643349414,-621240601],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"generic.armor_toughness",Operation:0,Amount:5,UUID:[I;2114290632,698998996,-207937751,-494454961],Slot:"mainhand"}],HideFlags:6,HoldingID:12}
